org.restlet
Interface Element

All Known Subinterfaces:
Cache, CharacterSet, Client, Component, Connector, ControlData, Cookie, CookieSetting, Data, Form, Gateway, Language, MediaType, Metadata, Method, OriginServer, Parameter, Preference, Proxy, Reference, Representation, RepresentationMetadata, Resolver, RestletContainer, RestletServer, Server, Status, Tag, Tunnel, UserAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConnector, AbstractRepresentation, CharacterSets, DefaultRepresentationMetadata, DefaultRestletContainer, DefaultRestletServer, EmptyValue, Languages, LocalClient, LocalConnector, MediaTypes, Methods, Statuses
public interface Element

Element of a software architecture.

"A software architecture is defined by a configuration of architectural elements--components, connectors, and data--constrained in their relationships in order to achieve a desired set of architectural properties." R.Fielding

See Also:
Source dissertation

          Returns the description of this REST element.
